name: Bank Robbers Run - Escape the Cops!
name_original: Bank Robbers Run - Escape the Cops!
description:
Sometimes we all want to be just a little bad, so step into the shoes of a bank robber and see what you got!

Get your blood pumping as you run trough the town and avoid the police to try and stay free.

Test your reflexes by avoiding the obstacles and dangers that come flying at you through the air!

See if you have what it takes to get away with the loot!

Features:
* Great for Kids or Adults
* Amazing graphics
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch
* Addictive Gaming

Download right now!
